pages.text: Sahu hai, asamana vi ate rata nu pragata hona vale di
Ate tusi ki jano ki uha rata nu pragata hona vala ki hai
Camakila tara
Ko'i bada ajiha nahim hai jisa de upara nigarana na hove
Tam manukha nu dekhana cahida hai ki uha kisa ciza tom' paida kita gi'a hai
Uha ika uchalade ho'e pani tom paida kita gi'a hai
Jihara nikalada hai pitha ate chati de vicom
Besaka uha (alaha) usa nu mura janama dena di takata rakhada hai
Jisa dina gupata galam di parakha hovegi
Usa vele manukha de kola na ko'i bala hovega ate na ko'i saha'ika
Sahu hai asamana de cakara marana vale di
Ate phatana vali dharati di
Besaka iha paki gala hai
Ate iha mazaka di gala nahim
Iha hujatam karana vica lage ho'e hana
Ate mai' vi yojana bana'una vica lagi'a ho'i'a ham
Tam tusim avagi'akari'am nu kujha dhila devem, basa kujha dinam di hi dhila devo
Apane palanahara de nama di pavitarata da varanana karo, jihara sabha tom sresata hai
Jisa ne paida kita phira savari'a
Jisa ne (samajha diti) thahira'i'a ate phira raha vikha'i'a
Jisa ne ghaha (cara) paida kita
Phira usa nu kale raga da kura bana dita
Asim tuhanu parhavange, phira tusim nahim bhuloge
Paratu jo alaha cahe, uha janada hai, `gujhi'am vi ate pragata vi
Ate asim tuhanu saukhe raha te lai calange
Tam sikhi'a devem, jekara sikhi'a labha deve
Uha bada upadesa savikara karega jihara darada hai
Uha jihara abhaga hovega, usa tom muha morega
Uha vadi aga vica digega
Uha na usa vica marega ate nam ji'unda rahega
Uha safala ho'i'a jisa ne apane apa nu pavitara kita
Ate apane raba da nama li'a, phira namaza parhi
